channel.title: CVE Feed for bytebase -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bytebase -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-32169|2024-08-03T07:32:55.979Z -- bytebase -- bytebase
item.description: The “Bytebase” application does not restrict low privilege user to access “admin issues“ for which an unauthorized user can view the “OPEN” and “CLOSED” issues by “Admin” and the affected endpoint is “/issue”.

item.title: CVE-2022-32170|2024-08-03T07:32:56.023Z -- bytebase -- bytebase
item.description: The “Bytebase” application does not restrict low privilege user to access admin “projects“ for which an unauthorized user can view the “projects“ created by “Admin” and the affected endpoint is “/api/project?user=${userId}”.
